TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FileFormatException extends System.FormatException implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

summary.span: 當應符合某種檔案格式規格的輸入檔案或資料流，格式不正確時，所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when an input file or a data stream that is supposed to conform to a certain file format specification is malformed.

summary.span: 建立 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public FileFormatException ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: FileFormatException();

summary.span: 建立 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會使用描述錯誤的預設系統訊息，例如 「 輸入的檔或資料流不會不符合預期的檔案格式規格。 」This constructor uses a default system message that describes the error, such as "An input file or a data stream does not conform to the expected file format specification." 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。This message takes into account the current system culture.

MemberSignature.Value: public FileFormatException (string message);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String)
public: FileFormatException(System::String ^ message);

param.name: message
param.span: 表示錯誤訊息的 值。

span.span: A value that represents the error message.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，建立 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

MemberSignature.Value: public FileFormatException (Uri sourceUri);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Uri sourceUri) cil managed
Public Sub New (sourceUri As Uri)
public: FileFormatException(Uri ^ sourceUri);

param.name: sourceUri
param.span: 造成這個錯誤之檔案的 值。

span.span: The value of the file that caused this error.

summary.span: 使用來源 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 值，建立 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class with a source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息會描述錯誤並包含檔案名稱，例如"檔案 '`sourceUri`' 不符合預期的檔案格式規格。 」This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error and includes the file name, such as "The file '`sourceUri`' does not conform to the expected file format specification." 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。This message takes into account the current system culture. 屬性會初始化使用`sourceUri`參數。The property is initialized using the `sourceUri` parameter.

summary.span: 建立 類別的新執行個體，並使用序列化資料將它初始化。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class and initializes it with serialized data.

summary.span: 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。

span.span: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.

summary.span: 取得造成 的檔案名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of a file that caused the .

value.span: ，表示造成例外狀況的檔案名稱。

span.span: A that represents the name the file that caused the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得造成例外狀況的檔案名稱時發生錯誤，傳回的值是否`null`，和 SourceUri。If there was an error in obtaining the name the file that caused the exception, the return value is `null`, and SourceUri. 會傳回空字串。returns an empty string.
